FuncDef:
The ifit command creates and displays an IFIT view, or displays an existing IFIT view.
The undo ifit command deletes the created IFIT view. The ifit command creates and displays an IFIT view, or displays an existing IFIT view. The undo ifit command deletes the created IFIT view. By default, no IFIT view is created. This command is supported only on the CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
ExtraInfo: To use IFIT to monitor or measure traffic, you can run this command to enter the IFIT view.
